org.apache.hadoop.conf

Interface Configurable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ImpersonationProvider, Reconfigurable, Tool
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDNSToSwitchMapping, AbstractMapWritable, AvroReflectSerialization, AvroSerialization, AvroSpecificSerialization, BaseExpression, BooleanWritable.Comparator, BytesWritable.Comparator, ByteWritable.Comparator, BZip2Codec, CachedDNSToSwitchMapping, ChecksumFileSystem, org.apache.hadoop.fs.shell.Command, Configured, CredentialShell, DefaultCodec, DefaultImpersonationProvider, DeflateCodec, DoubleWritable.Comparator, EnumSetWritable, FileSystem, FilterExpression, FilterFileSystem, FloatWritable.Comparator, org.apache.hadoop.fs.shell.FsCommand, FsShell.Help, FsShell.Usage, org.apache.hadoop.fs.FsShellPermissions, FsShellPermissions.Chgrp, FsShellPermissions.Chmod, FsShellPermissions.Chown, FTPFileSystem, GenericWritable, GetGroupsBase, GzipCodec, HarFileSystem, HttpFileSystem, HttpsFileSystem, IntWritable.Comparator, KDiag, KeyShell, LocalFileSystem, LongWritable.Comparator, LongWritable.DecreasingComparator, Lz4Codec, MapWritable, MD5Hash.Comparator, NullWritable.Comparator, ObjectWritable, RawLocalFileSystem, ReconfigurableBase, RecordComparator, SaslPropertiesResolver, ScriptBasedMapping, ScriptBasedMapping.RawScriptBasedMapping, SFTPFileSystem, ShellCommandFencer, ShortWritable.Comparator, SnappyCodec, SocksSocketFactory, SortedMapWritable, SshFenceByTcpPort, TableMapping, Text.Comparator, Trash, TrashPolicy, UTF8.Comparator, ViewFileSystem, WhitelistBasedResolver, WritableComparator, WritableSerialization, ZStandardCodec

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
@InterfaceStability.Stable
public interface Configurable
    Something that may be configured with a Configuration.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Configuration getConf()
      Return the configuration used by this object.
      void setConf(Configuration conf)
      Set the configuration to be used by this object.
